Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 69th overall pick, by Houston in 2006...
Traded from Houston to Baltimore on 6/12/2006 (Going to BAL: P W. LeBlanc. Going to HOU: P R. Halladay)...
Injured on 6/30/2007 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2010...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/24/2011, off Wilfredo Ledezma (HOU)...
Traded from Baltimore to Cleveland on 1/31/2015 (Going to CLE: P I. Kennedy, P W. LeBlanc, P G. Richards, P C. Perez. Going to BAL: C K. Deglan)...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/2/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/16/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Toronto to New York (A) on 7/31/2018 (Going to TOR: P T. McNutt. Going to NYA: P W. LeBlanc, P W. Winterspring)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/14/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
